page.title: 04LIFE ON A FARM (I)
page.content: I live on a chicken and cattle farm.I do not know much about the cattle side of the farm but my Dad is the manager of the chicken side.The company's name is Broadbridge.they have three farms around Bosham,I live on one near West Ashling. It is quite big and it has 78,000 chickens.There are five houses and is going to be made bigger,upto 120,000 chickens.I have lived on two other chicken farms and they had the eggs collected by hand,but where I live,the eggs are on belts and they come through all the houses and into the biggest one where they are sorted out and packed.The egg lorry comes twice a week and then the eggs go up to Thames Valley Eggs.
